trends: There has been one other sighting in Worland
There were no other sightings in Worland on or around January 10th 2003
divs: Sighting Detailswe was fishing all night long. we noticed it when it was hovering right aboveus. when we first saw it we was really scared and didnt know what to do butstare. then it emited a light that took us up to the ship. then about 3 hr laterwe were all lying on the ground naked. and we all seen the same thing so itwasnt a dream but no one belives us.
Summary: Late night fishing trip suddenly ended
